required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Training Procedural Simulation of Nurses in Reducing Complications Related to Arteriovenous Fistula Puncture
clinical_study.official_title: Interest of Training in Procedural Simulation of Nurses in Reducing Complications Related to Arteriovenous Fistula Puncture in Chronic Hemodialysis Patients

brief_summary.textblock: Interest of training in procedural simulation of nurses in the reduction of complications related to arteriovenous fistula puncture in hemodialysis patients

detailed_description.textblock:
Primary objective :
To compare the number of complications related to arteriovenous fistula (AVF)puncture before and after a complete simulation training program, on a fistula arm of procedural simulation (conceptualization of the approach + puncture + palpation + identification + use of ultrasound)
Secondary objective (s):
Compare other adverse events related to AVF puncture during a hemodialysis session

primary_outcome.measure: Complications related to arteriovenous fistula puncture (AVF)
primary_outcome.description: Number of complications of fistula puncture : either failed unipuncture puncture either failed bipunctional puncture either simple hematoma either hematoma does not allow the continuation of dialysis

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events related to AVF puncture during a hemodialysis session
secondary_outcome.description: Number of perdialytic bleeding : accidental removal of the needle

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events related to AVF puncture during a hemodialysis session
secondary_outcome.description: Pain score (EN digital scale) felt at the time of puncture

intervention.description: pre-training observation training post training observation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients whose nurse is trained in hemodialysis receiving a FAV puncture in the hemodialysis unit of the nephrology department, dialysis, transplantation
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with AVF puncture in the emergency / withdrawal area of the nephrology department, dialysis, transplantation
